name: G - Universe Gundam
text: This mighty machine has slain many fighters. As the first of it's kind. It has laid a curse upon us all.
pendulum_text: This card can only be used to Pendulum Summon "G -Universe" monsters. During the Damage Step, when a "G - Universe" monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your field to the GY; that monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, until the end of this turn.
